plan_context.purpose: To validate the implementation of the new checkout flow, ensuring it is faster, easier, and supports guest users.

requirements.description: After a purchase, an email confirmation with order details should be sent to the customer.
ambiguity_flags: Definition of 'fast' is unclear, possibly under a minute or 30 seconds.

requirements.description: Users should be able to checkout without creating an account.
ambiguity_flags: UX design for encouraging account creation is not finalized.

requirements.description: Customers can apply a discount code at checkout, updating the total before payment.
ambiguity_flags: Handling of multiple discount codes and expired codes is undefined.

requirements.description: Display order details after purchase, including item name, quantity, price, total, and possibly estimated delivery.
ambiguity_flags: Inclusion of estimated delivery is not confirmed.
